Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientRMI, ClientSocket

    public abstract class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface, java.io.Serializable
    The client object, one for each player.

      • suspendOutput

        public void suspendOutput(boolean set)
        If set to true, prevents the client from printing messages to the player. Useful when the client is waiting for a non-blocking input.
        Parameters:
        set - the output suspension status
